original_text: my spirit was not at rest because I did not find my brother Titus there. So I took leave of them and went on to Macedonia.
korean_text: 내가 내 형제 디도를 만나지 못하므로 내 심령이 편하지 못하여 그들을 작별하고 마게도냐로 갔노라

sentences.original_text: my spirit was not at rest
because I did not find my brother Titus there
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 나의 형제 디도를 만나지 못하였음이라

sentences.original_text: So I took leave of them
